effect.sword_shield: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

effect.legends_arceus: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.sword_shield: Makes the target act next this turn.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
